name: About
body:
### About Me.

Geek girl, hiker, runner, and lover of music, fashion and travel.

A recent Hackbright Academy Fellow; Wendy is an aspiring DevOps Engineer with an affinity for building resilient and scalable database, web and API infrastructure.

Wendy spends much of her time in San Francisco, but when sheâ€™s not sharpening her full stack development skills or tweaking Vagrant boxes you might spot Wendy in the Sierras, hiking the Evolution Valley Loop.
